oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Christian Brothers College Football Team, 1911
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Football; Football players
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Members of the CBC team under Coach "Fatty" McLain were Flautt, Arnold, LaCrois, McDonald, Campbell, Harris, T.C. Guinee, Smith, C. Shea, J. Shea, Pierini, Perry, Long, Demarchi, Griffin, T. Shea, F. Guinee, Wheeler, Ross Bland, Quinn, Hays, Giddins. The captain was named Harrington; the manager, Stanton. It is unknown which of these were pictured.
